dashboard.label: Web Summary
dashboard.description: The following dashboard shows a general overview of the web.

single.title: Total Transaction Request on the Web Page
Total Transaction Request from Western USA

search.query: index=transactions sourcetype=transaction_data | eval region=case(city in("New york", "Chicago", "Boston", "Washington D.C."), "Eastern USA", city in("San Francisco", "Seattle"), "Western USA") | search region="Western USA" | stats count

single.title: Total Transaction Request from Eastern USA

search.query: index=transactions sourcetype=transaction_data | eval region=case(city in("New york", "Chicago", "Boston", "Washington D.C."), "Eastern USA", city in("San Francisco", "Seattle"), "Western USA") | search region="Eastern USA" | stats count

single.title: Successful Transaction Requests on the Web Page

chart.title: Successful Transaction Requests by Western US Cities

search.query: index=transactions sourcetype=transaction_data status=200 | eval region=case(city in("New york", "Chicago", "Boston", "Washington D.C."), "Eastern USA", city in("San Francisco", "Seattle"), "Western USA") | search region="Western USA" | stats count by city

chart.title: Successful Transaction Requests by Eastern US Cities

search.query: index=transactions sourcetype=transaction_data status=200 | eval region=case(city in("New york", "Chicago", "Boston", "Washington D.C."), "Eastern USA", city in("San Francisco", "Seattle"), "Western USA") | search region="Eastern USA" | stats count by city
index=transactions sourcetype=transaction_data status=* | timechart count span=1d by status
index=transactions sourcetype=transaction_data method=* | timechart count span=1d by method
